item.title: Chaos with a pocket calculator.
item.description: 1 Introducing A Simple System 2 Summarising A Simple System 3 Understanding A Simple System 4 The Study of Non-Elephant Animals div#TOC li { list-style:none; background-image:none; background-repeat:none; background-position:0; } Most non-fiction books teach you what to think. They provide you with a new set of facts to trot out when someone brings up pop psychology at the pub or let you feel smart when you parrot some Econ101 theory to ‘explain’ why the Bank of England cut interest rates.
